DOC.brief_summary: Dysphagia one severe complication among stroke survivor . Dysphagia usually associate high level morbidity , mortality , financial cost . In recent year , repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) show promise facilitate poststroke dysphagia . However , research preliminary study past . The present study aim investigate immediate long-term efficacy high frequency rTMS chronic dysphagic patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Poststroke Dysphagia Recovery
DOC.detailed_description: rTMS protocol : 5 Hz real sham stimulation , 10 minute per day , 10 week-days .
DOC.criteria: Poststroke dysphagia 3 month Hx seizure metalic device brain chest
